su-script.description: Send a talk spurt to the group.
su-script.script: def doSendTalkSpurt(): global su su.setTransmitPriority("NORMAL",4) su.sendTalkSpurt("calledGroup")

su-script.description: Send a talk spurt to the group at a higher priority.
su-script.script: def doSendTalkSpurt(): global su su.sendMute("calledGroup") su.sendUnmute("calledGroup",1500)
